Articles.Content:
What the heck is with my KSC Menu screen? I load up my save, and instead of my KSC overview screen where you select the R&D, Astronaut Complex, Admin Building, Tracking Station, Mission Control, the VAB, or the SPH, and I get this:

![R5vdJiY.png](http://i.imgur.com/R5vdJiY.png)

I have about 6-8 mods, none too big mostly small like Kerbal Engineer, RCS Build Aid, and a few parts packs. Does anybody else get this?? I've gone in and out of my save 12 times at one point without getting it to work.

You can see I have a probe on the middle right landed at the Astronaut Complex, and I can't click it, or any other building.

Sorry for the frustration but it annoys the crap out of me when I can't even play my game D:<

-Slab

EDIT: Embedding is the worst. [http://imgur.com/R5vdJiY](http://imgur.com/R5vdJiY)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T18:58:48Z" title="04/21/2015 06:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
Your imgur album doesn't seem to be working, but if the camera has changed angles, it's because you alt-tabbed away from ksp while it was loading the ksc screen, I've had this problem too.

Oh that may be it actually, I just loaded it while I was tabbed into KSP, sorry for the mess up. Is the edited link not even working?

Also, labeling answered unless you're wrong ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Thank you!

> 
> What the heck is with my KSC Menu screen? I load up my save, and instead of my KSC overview screen where you select the R&D, Astronaut Complex, Admin Building, Tracking Station, Mission Control, the VAB, or the SPH, and I get this:
> [http://imgur.com/a/R5vdJiY](http://imgur.com/a/R5vdJiY)
> 
> I have about 6-8 mods, none too big mostly small like Kerbal Engineer, RCS Build Aid, and a few parts packs. Does anybody else get this?? I've gone in and out of my save 12 times at one point without getting it to work.
> 
> You can see I have a probe on the middle right landed at the Astronaut Complex, and I can't click it, or any other building.
> 
> Sorry for the frustration but it annoys the crap out of me when I can't even play my game D:<
> 
> -Slab
> 
> EDIT: Embedding is the worst. [http://imgur.com/R5vdJiY](http://imgur.com/R5vdJiY)

You dont need to post the URL for imgur pics, it should have a "link option" when you click on the image in your album.

Like this.

![s2vrIY7.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/s2vrIY7.jpg)

Which for your picture would be found under the picture in your Imgur account, click on it, then highlight and copy the BBCode link. Past that link here without adding anything else to it. DONE! It isnt rocket science.

And it sounds like you have a conflict somewhere. Try checking your output.log for errors, or hitting ALT+F2 this is probably spamming a steady stream of red NULREF errors.

Here ya go.

Gotta do it like this:

[noparse]![R5vdJiY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/R5vdJiY.jpg)[/noparse]

![R5vdJiY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/R5vdJiY.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T20:42:53Z" title="04/20/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by Slam\_Jones**

It happened to me today too, i just exit to main menu (mouse wheel didnt work but the exit button did) and enter again and everything ok. It was running in second plane while i was doing other things, maybe it had something to do with the issue...
If you alt-tab out while loading to space center (from, say, the load-game menu) you sometimes get this bug.
I get this bug *every single time* I load my save if I alt + tab out while waiting for it to load. Apparently they fixed it once but now it's been back for some time.
Well, at least we know what not to do if we dont want this to happen...

Oddly enough this KSP bug also appears in exactly the same way on OSX if you Command-Tab away from KSP when loading a save. This is funny because it's reasonable to assume OSX and Windows implement command-tab and alt-tab program window switching differently even though the two operations appear the same. KSP thing? Unity thing? Who knows.

> 
> Oddly enough this KSP bug also appears in exactly the same way on OSX if you Command-Tab away from KSP when loading a save. This is funny because it's reasonable to assume OSX and Windows implement command-tab and alt-tab program window switching differently even though the two operations appear the same. KSP thing? Unity thing? Who knows.

I'd guess it's just tied to losing focus, regardless of how.
I don't alt-tab anymore. Alt+Enter to make it windowed and switch that way. I have never run into this bug doing it like that.

I have seen this countless times, the only option is ragequit and launch ksp again and hope. lmao

To be fair it happened all the time with .25 now on .9 :s i've seen it twice. amillion times better. 

I think it happened regardless of alt tab, i am playing in window aswell with mods.
Ah thanks, now I know what not to do! Restarting KSP 0.9 does get old quickly...
